name: Scary Night Escape War
description:
Welcome To Scary Night Escape War , download and enjoy with this game. You will also be amazed with New characters.

Features:

- 35 different Levels,
- 3 Power ups: Shield, Speedy, Life,
- Easy control by touching any place on screen,
- Nice Background music,
- Fun for children,
- Completely Free,
- Use this game to keep your kids.

How to play:

- Touch screen and control the nichtguard
- Collect stars and reach the gold to complete level
